project_descr: This programme is focused on the promotion of Job Creation and Sustainable Livelihoods; develoment of capacity for economic management; Enhancement of Medium, Small Scale Enterprises and financial intermediation.

outputs.output_descr:
This programme is focused on the promotion of Job Creation and Sustainable Livelihoods; develoment of capacity for economic management; Enhancement of Medium, Small Scale Enterprises and financial intermediation.1. Training for improving service delivery for SME operators undertaken		
2. SME operators trained in management skills for enhanced standardization and productivity
